snippet: The European Union authorities offered a series of proposals that reflected a renewed effort to impose clearer rules for both member states and migrants....
abstract: European Commission releases number of proposals to give European Union member states more agency in deciding how to accept refugees while also offering 10,000 euros for every refugee accepted.

byline.contributor: Niki Kitsantonis contributed reporting from Athens.

lead_paragraph: The European Union authorities offered a series of proposals that reflected a renewed effort to impose clearer rules for both member states and migrants.

headline.main: E.U. Offers New Immigration Plan, Hoping to Sway Reluctant Countries
headline.print_headline: E.U. Offers a New Plan on Immigration

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
